section.title: Create a new Databases Connection
section.para: Switch to the perspective "Database Development" and select "Database Connections", right mouse click and select new.
Maintain a Database location where the new database should be stored on your file system. The flag "Create database (if required)" should be selected. Maintain user and password and press finish.
Congratulation! You have created a new database.

section.title: Create a new Databases Connection
section.para: Now your folder Database should have an additional entry. Right it and select connect (if you not connected).
Open then tree to see the content of your new database.
Congratulation. You have connected yourself to the new database.

para.tip: Sometimes you have to disconnect and connect again to see the changes you did. For example if you create a new database schema.
